T02D1404:246b-1: ratna tsha da n'a ma panytsi k'a /
T02D1404:246b-3: rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel /
T02D1404:246b-4: dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1404:246b-5: sna tshogs padma'i ge sar rdul gyis sku byugs pa //
T02D1404:246b-6: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas dam pa'i gzi brjid ldan //
T02D1404:246b-7: ral pa can gyi mgo dang au ma'i nu ma gnyis //
T02D1404:246b-8: zhabs kyis mnan cing dpa' bo'i 'dug stangs kyis bzhugs pa //
T02D1404:246b-9: rdor dril phyag ni g-yas dang g-yon gyis 'dzin pa dang //
T02D1404:246b-10: glang chen dpa' bo'i pags pa 'dzin pa'i gar thabs can //
T02D1404:246b-11: snying rje'i rgyu las byung ba'i myu gu'i bde mchog gis //
T02D1404:246b-12: rnal 'byor la gnas rnal 'byor pa rnams srung gyur cig //
T02D1404:246b-13: sbas pa'i tshig don rin chen ming gi brag rgyud las //
T02D1404:246b-14: dka' rgyal zla ba'i shes rab rnon pos brkos pa yis //
T02D1404:246b-15: tshig gi rmongs pa'i mun pa chen pos 'joms byed pa //
T02D1404:246b-16: rin chen tshogs zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel 'di byung ngo //
T02D1404:246b-19: de bzhin mtshan mchog bla ma'i rgyud //
T02D1404:246b-20: kha sbyar rgyud dang bzhi po ni //
T02D1404:246b-21: bshad pa'i rgyud du shes par bya //
T02D1404:246b-22: de dag dang ni rgyud gzhan rnams //
T02D1404:246b-23: rin chen tshogs zhes bya ba yi //
T02D1404:246b-25: mkhas pas rang dbang snyam mi brtag / de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba //
T02D1404:246b-26: mdor bsdus pa ste rgyas par min //
T02D1404:246b-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
T02D1404:246b-28: sku dang ras ris kyi mtshan nyid ston pa'i le'u
T02D1404:246b-29: bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'i 'og tu rang dad pa'i
T02D1404:246b-30: lha thams cad kyi mtshan nyid ston par byed pa'i
T02D1404:246b-31: rgyud 'di yin zhes pa ni de nas kyis ston
T02D1404:246b-32: to // le'u de las kyang gsang bas na de nas gsang ba'o //
T02D1404:246b-33: mdor bsdus pa ni ma spros shing nyung la mi gsal bar byas pa ste /
T02D1404:246b-34: bla ma mnyes par ma byas pa rnams kyis rtogs par dka' zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1404:246b-35: sangs rgyas rnams la gsang ba ste /
T02D1404:246b-36: gzhan rnams la ni smos ci dgos zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
T02D1404:246b-37: 'dir ni rang dad pa'i lha'i sbyor ba dang mi ldan pa dang /
T02D1404:246b-38: dam tshig la mi gnas pa rnams la dngos grub
T02D1404:246b-39: chen por mi 'gyur zhes de'i phyir dam tshig dang
T02D1404:246b-40: rang dad pa'i lha'i sbyor ba'i don du dkyil 'khor
T02D1404:246b-41: sngon du 'gro ba'i gsang ba bstan par bya'o //

T02D1404:247a-1: bshad na 'jig rten gyis rtogs par 'gyur snyam pa
T02D1404:247a-2: de spang bar bya ba'i phyir khyad par du rgyas
T02D1404:247a-3: par min zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T02D1404:247a-4: gsang ba de yang ji lta bu yin zhe na /
T02D1404:247a-6: he ru ka dpal yang dag sbyor //
T02D1404:247a-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa ni /
T02D1404:247a-9: rgyu rkyen gyis stong pa dang /
T02D1404:247a-10: bkod pa thams cad la nges par grol ba khyad
T02D1404:247a-11: par du byed pa'i sku dpal he ru ka zhes
T02D1404:247a-12: bshad do // he ru ka de'i yang dag par

T02D1404:247a-15: bshad do // ba ste / rin po che'i kha
T02D1404:247a-16: sbyar ltar ma mo'i 'khor lo yongs su bstan to

T02D1404:247a-19: 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa //
T02D1404:247a-21: gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa rnams kyi sems can

T02D1404:247a-23: pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa'o //
T02D1404:247a-24: bla ma zhes bya ba ni khams bcu drug pa'o //

T02D1404:247a-27: n'a da de rnams ni mkha' 'gro ma ste /
T02D1404:247a-28: mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'o //
T02D1404:247a-29: de rnams kyi dra ba ni mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs so //
T02D1404:247a-30: de'i sdom pa ni dam tshig ste mkha' 'gro ma ste mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'i sdom mo //
T02D1404:247a-31: de yang 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes gleng
T02D1404:247a-32: gzhir bstan pa'i phyir gsang ba de lta bu la

T02D1404:247a-37: so so'i skye bo bzhin du dam chos 'di ldog
T02D1404:247a-38: pa'i yan lag tu 'gyur snyam na /
T02D1404:247a-39: de rnams la grub pa'i mtha' thams cad dang ldan

T02D1404:247a-42: gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na //
T02D1404:247a-43: zhes bya ba ni de la dang po par ma
T02D1404:247a-44: dang tha mar gnas pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i
T02D1404:247a-45: tshul ji lta ba bzhin du /
T02D1404:247a-46: dang po gsang ba'i tshig dang de bzhin mchog ni bar ma dang /
T02D1404:247a-47: dgyes pa ni tha ma ste der bdag gis thos so //
T02D1404:247a-48: thams cad bdag nyid ni dus gzhan med pa'i tshe /
T02D1404:247b-0: de bas na tshig lnga @247b ni 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
T02D1404:247b-1: bcom ldan 'das bzhugs zhes tshig lnga pos ston pa ni /
T02D1404:247b-3: gsang ba ston par byed pa'i tshigs su bcad pa
T02D1404:247b-4: smras pa dang po gsang ba la gnas shing bar
T02D1404:247b-5: ma rig par shes par bya /

T02D1404:247b-7: myong ba thos pa zhes bshad do //
T02D1404:247b-8: gsang ba'i gsang ba bar ma ste //
T02D1404:247b-9: dgyes pa mchog ni dpyid kyi dus //
T02D1404:247b-10: rtag tu dus gcig bshad pa yin //
T02D1404:247b-11: thams cad bdag nyid bcom ldan bzhugs //
T02D1404:247b-13: gleng gzhi so sor bstan na /
T02D1404:247b-14: da ni de la gnas pa'i gsang ba bstan pa'i phyir smras pa /
T02D1404:247b-15: mkha' 'gro ma kun dam tshig sems //
T02D1404:247b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
T02D1404:247b-17: mdor bsdus pa ste rgyas par min //
T02D1404:247b-18: zhes bya ba'i tshig gis bshad pa gang yin pa
T02D1404:247b-19: de ni 'dir mdor bsdus pa'i tshig bshad pa'i rgyud
T02D1404:247b-20: las mang du gsungs pa ni /
T02D1404:247b-21: gsang ba sa yi khams yin te //
T02D1404:247b-22: mchog ni chu ru bshad pa yin //
T02D1404:247b-23: dgyes pa me zhes rnam par bshad //
T02D1404:247b-24: thams cad bdag nyid g-yo ba ste //
T02D1404:247b-25: rtag tu nam mkha' khyab par gnas //
T02D1404:247b-26: ra ni khrag gi khams zhes bya //
T02D1404:247b-27: ha ni ri las byung ba ste //
T02D1404:247b-28: sya ni dri yi lo ma yin //
T02D1404:247b-29: pa ni pags par rab tu bshad //
T02D1404:247b-30: ra ni dri nyid bshad pa ste //
T02D1404:247b-31: yi ge mi ni me tog bshad //
T02D1404:247b-32: yi ge ra ni de bzhin chu //
T02D1404:247b-33: mi ni pe sha ta gsungs yin //
T02D1404:247b-34: yi ge sa ni kun du ru //
T02D1404:247b-35: de bzhin rba ni rang byung ste //
T02D1404:247b-36: yi ge tma ni chu nyid yin //
T02D1404:247b-37: ne ni lha mo dri ldan til //
T02D1404:247b-38: yi ge sa ni sbrang bu'i rdul //
T02D1404:247b-39: de bzhin da ni mtsho skyes pa'o //
T02D1404:247b-40: sthe ni kha yi snying po ste //
T02D1404:247b-41: yi ge tya ni ka pu ra //
T02D1404:247b-42: mkha' 'gro ma kun dam tshig go //
T02D1404:247b-43: zhes bya ba ni khrag yin te /
T02D1404:247b-45: sems dpa' ni sa'i khams so //
T02D1404:247b-46: rdo rje sems dpa' ni chu'i khams so //
T02D1404:247b-50: mkha' 'gro ma kun dam tshig khrag / sems dpa' rdo rje kun 'byung ba //
T02D1404:247b-51: padma rab tu gsal sbyor bas //
T02D1404:247b-52: padma gar dbang mchog tu bshad //
T02D1404:247b-53: steng gi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba //
T02D1404:247b-54: rdo rje nyi mar rab tu grags //
T02D1404:247b-56: de la sems dpa' ni skyes dgu ste skyes bu'i khyad par ro //
T02D1404:247b-57: de rnams kyi ni rdo rje ni de'i rtags so //
T02D1404:248a-2: rdo rje sems dpa' las byung bas te /
T02D1404:248a-4: padma gar gyi bya ba ste padma gar ro //
T02D1404:248a-5: de la dbang byed pas na padma gar gyi dbang phyug ste /
T02D1404:248a-6: 'das ma thag pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' ni rdo rje nyi mar bshad do //
T02D1404:248a-7: mchog ces bya ba ni padma gar gyi dbang phyug
T02D1404:248a-8: gi tshig gis mchog tu 'dzin par khrag bshad do
T02D1404:248a-9: // padma'i 'od gsal ba mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir rdo rje nyi ma'o //
T02D1404:248a-10: steng gi 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba zla ba'i
T02D1404:248a-11: steng du 'od kyis khyab pa'i phyir de nyid rnam
T02D1404:248a-13: rta mchog kyang rlung gis bskyod pa'i sems nyid kyis sna tshogs 'byung ba'o //
T02D1404:248a-14: zhu ba'i gzugs nyid kyis snying stobs dang /
T02D1404:248a-15: rdul dang mun pa dang dbyer med pa'i ye shes ni rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1404:248a-16: de bzhin du yang bshad pa /
T02D1404:248a-17: snang zhing 'bar ba nyid kyis ni //
T02D1404:248a-18: thub pa chen po rnam snang mdzad //
T02D1404:248a-19: mthar thug mthar ni rta mchog ste //
T02D1404:248a-20: sna tshogs rlung la yang dag 'byung //
T02D1404:248a-22: yang na bshad pa'i rgyud gzhan ltar na /
T02D1404:248a-23: mkha' 'gro ma thams cad dam tshig ces bya ba ni mkha' 'gro dang /
T02D1404:248a-24: dkyil 'khor pa'i mkha' 'gro ma rab gtum mo la sogs pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02D1404:248a-25: de dag rdul phra rab kyi rnam pa nyid kyi
T02D1404:248a-26: phyir mkha' 'gro ma kun gyi dam tshig sems can
T02D1404:248a-27: gyi don mdzad pa'i phyir sems dpa'o //
T02D1404:248a-28: mi shes pa'i ri bo 'joms pa'i phyir rdo rje ste ye shes su bshad do //
T02D1404:248a-29: sems dpa' ni 'jig rten gnyis te sems can gyi 'jig rten dang snod kyi 'jig rten no //
T02D1404:248a-30: de la sems can ni g-yo ba ste mi la sogs pa'o ;
T02D1404:248a-31: / snod ni brtan ba ste nags tshal dang ri la sogs pa'o //
T02D1404:248a-32: de gnyis kyang rnam pa bzhir dbye ste /
T02D1404:248a-33: sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha'o //
T02D1404:248a-34: de ltar na tshig gsum gyis bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka'i sku gsum bshad do //
T02D1404:248a-36: mkha' 'gro ma kun gyi dam tshig / ces pa sprul pa'i sku'o //
T02D1404:248a-37: sems dpa' ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
T02D1404:248a-38: rdo rje sems dpa' ni chos kyi sku'o //
T02D1404:248a-39: sku gsum gyis bsdus pa sku bzhi pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir smras pa /
T02D1404:248a-40: mchog ces bya ba ni sku gsum gyi mchog ste /
T02D1404:248b-0: bde ba zhes bya ba ni @248b mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1404:248b-1: de la bshad pa de nyid dpal he ru ka 'khor lo can mchog dga'o //
T02D1404:248b-2: da ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir smras pa /
T02D1404:248b-3: 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan dpa' //
T02D1404:248b-5: 'di zhes bya ba 'das ma thag pa'i tshigs su bcad pas bshad pa bde mchog nyid do //
T02D1404:248b-6: rang 'byung zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba chen pos
T02D1404:248b-7: gzhal bar bya ba rjes su mthun pa'i tshul nyid
T02D1404:248b-8: kyis rang gi ngang gis byung ba'i phyir rang byung
T02D1404:248b-9: ngo // dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams dang ldan pa'i phyir dang /
T02D1404:248b-10: nyon mongs pa la sogs pa'i bdud bcom pa'i phyir /
T02D1404:248b-12: mi mthun pa'i phyogs rtog pa ma lus pa las rgyal bas dpa' bo'o //
T02D1404:248b-13: mkha' 'gro ma ni rtsa rnams so //
T02D1404:248b-14: de rnams kyi dra ba ni n'a da'i 'khor lo'o //
T02D1404:248b-15: de nyid dam tshig ni sdom pa ste gang la
T02D1404:248b-16: yod pa de ni mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'i sdom
T02D1404:248b-17: mo // de nyid gcig pu lhag pa'i lha ;
T02D1404:248b-18: / zhes glegs bam gzhan las smos pa gcig pu ni bcom ldan 'das gnyis su med pa'o //
T02D1404:248b-19: lhag pa ni khyad par ro //
T02D1404:248b-20: lha nyid ni lha mo ste gsang ba la sogs
T02D1404:248b-21: pa'i tshig tu sngar bshad pa'i spyan la sogs pa'i
T02D1404:248b-23: de rnams shu kra dang raktar gtogs pa'i lha mo
T02D1404:248b-24: ni mkha' 'gro ma lnga 'khor los sgyur ba dang
T02D1404:248b-26: phung po lnga dang skye mched drug gi lha mo rnams so //
T02D1404:248b-27: gcig pa nyid kyis de rnams ro gcig pa yin pa'i phyir de rnams las lhag pa'i phyir lha'o //
T02D1404:248b-28: de yang gal te rang byung yin na gang las 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na smras pa /
T02D1404:248b-29: kun las byung ba'i sgra yi gzugs //
T02D1404:248b-30: zhes bya ba la sogs pa log par rtog pa
T02D1404:248b-31: thams cad las 'das pa'i bde ba dam pa las
T02D1404:248b-33: skye mched kyi mtshan nyid srid pa'i gzugs can bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung zhes bstan to //
T02D1404:248b-34: sgra'i gzugs zhes bya ba ni dril bu'i sgra tsam ste /
T02D1404:248b-35: shes rab kyi dbyangs rjes su 'gro ba sgra'i rnam
T02D1404:248b-36: par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid sgra tsam gyi gzugs brag
T02D1404:248b-37: ca lta bu de las byung zhes bya ba'i don
T02D1404:248b-38: to // don dam pa las rang byung gcig pu
T02D1404:248b-39: yang 'byung bar ma zad kyi rnam pa mang du
T02D1404:248b-40: 'byung bar bstan par bya ba'i phyir smras pa /
T02D1404:249a-0: @249a * // nges 'byung dam tshig spyod yul rnams //
T02D1404:249a-2: nges 'byung ni yul la sogs pa'i bye brag gis
T02D1404:249a-3: nges par 'byung ba ste sna tshogs su snang ba'o
T02D1404:249a-4: // rang gi yid kyi yul la sogs pa nyid
T02D1404:249a-5: du mnyam zhing gcig pu nyid du gyur pas dam
T02D1404:249a-6: // tshig ste / gzugs la sogs pa yul dang yul can dbang po drug ste /
T02D1404:249a-7: skye mched bcu gnyis ni dam tshig go //
T02D1404:249a-8: de rnams dngos po med par spyod pa ni spyod pa'o //
T02D1404:249a-9: de lta bu'i rang bzhin rtogs pa ni spyod yul te /
T02D1404:249a-10: phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems bshad do //
T02D1404:249a-11: rtags kyi tshig gi ngor mang po'i tshig gi mtha' can du gsungs so //
T02D1404:249a-12: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir smras pa /

T02D1404:249a-14: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum ni srid pa gsum ste /
T02D1404:249a-15: 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams so //
T02D1404:249a-16: de rnams ni zag pa dang bcas pa yin pa'i
T02D1404:249a-17: phyir de rnams la rnyed par dka' zhes bya ba'i
T02D1404:249a-18: don to // thog ma dbus mthar rnam par gnas //
T02D1404:249a-20: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gleng gzhi'i tshig der bshad do //
T02D1404:249a-21: de yang ji ltar bstan zhe na /
T02D1404:249a-23: shes rab thabs kyi sbyor ci bzhin //
T02D1404:249a-24: zhes bya ba la shes rab ni bsrub bya ste /
T02D1404:249a-26: thabs ni srub byed de rdo rje'o //
T02D1404:249a-27: de gnyis kyi sbyor ba ni thabs dang shes rab
T02D1404:249a-28: kyi sbyor ba ste de las ji skad bshad pa
T02D1404:249a-29: bzhin rtogs pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D1404:249a-30: de nyid dpes bstan par bya ba'i phyir smras pa /
T02D1404:249a-31: de bzhin sngags bzlas bsam sogs ldan //
T02D1404:249a-32: zhes bya ba la bzlas pa ni bzla ba ste nang gi smra ba'o //
T02D1404:249a-33: bsam gtan ni ting nge 'dzin te tshig dang sdom
T02D1404:249a-34: pa'i tshul dang 'dul ba dang dga' ba la sogs
T02D1404:249a-35: pa'o // gsum po de rnams go rims kyis byung ba de dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1404:249a-36: sbyor nyid cho ga'i ye shes ni //
T02D1404:249a-38: na d'a rnams dang phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams kyi sbyor bas na sbyor ba ste /
T02D1404:249a-39: dpal he ru ka'i sbyor pa'o //
T02D1404:249a-40: sbyor ba de la cho ga ni sbyor ba'i cho ga ste mngon par rtogs pa'o //
T02D1404:249a-41: de shes pas ni cho ga shes pa'o //
T02D1404:249a-42: de'i dngos po'am las ni sbyor ba shes pa nyid do //
T02D1404:249b-0: bdud @249b rtsi lnga'i mtshan nyid du gyur pa'i dpal
T02D1404:249b-1: he ru ka'i rnam pa lha bzhengs pa'i cho ga
T02D1404:249b-3: brgyus shing byas pas gtso bor gyur pa nyid kyis
T02D1404:249b-4: bcom ldan 'das dpal bde mchog gang gis rtogs par
T02D1404:249b-5: 'gyur ba de tshig gi tshogs rjod par byed pa'o
T02D1404:249b-6: // de la rgyud de las gsungs pa bshad de ;
T02D1404:249b-7: rigs lnga'i mtshan nyid de kho na nyid ni brjod par bya ba gsungs so //
T02D1404:249b-8: mnyan par gyis zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje khyod kyis /
T02D1404:249b-9: he ru ka dpal yang dag sbyor //
T02D1404:249b-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa
T02D1404:249b-11: rnams nyon cig ces bya ba'i tshig rnam par sbyar
T02D1404:249b-12: ro // de kho na nyid de ci lta bu yin zhe na smras pa /
T02D1404:249b-13: dbugs dbyung bar ma mchog bsdu ba //
T02D1404:249b-14: zhes bya ba la dang po dang tha ma ni
T02D1404:249b-15: gzhon pa dang rgas pa ste de gnyis kyi dbus
T02D1404:249b-16: na yod pa ste rdul lo //
T02D1404:249b-17: de yang myos shing dregs par byed pas na mchog ste lha ma yin gyi slob dpon no //
T02D1404:249b-18: de gnyis bsdus pa ni mdor bsdus pa'i tshogs gang
T02D1404:249b-19: la yod pa de ni bar ma dang mchog gi
T02D1404:249b-20: tshogs bsdu ba'o // de bas na bar ma dang mchog gi bsdu ba ni tshogs so //
T02D1404:249b-21: bar ma dang mchog gi sgras nye bar mtshon cing tshogs bsdu ba'i phyir /
T02D1404:249b-22: ci bar ma dang mchog spang bya yin nam zhe na smras pa /
T02D1404:249b-23: dri yi chu dang bcas pa yis //
T02D1404:249b-25: dri'i chu ni se la ga ste de dang bcas
T02D1404:249b-26: pa ni dri'i chu dang bcas pa ste ka pu
T02D1404:249b-27: ra'o // dri'i chu dang bcas pa des tshogs bstan to //
T02D1404:249b-28: tshogs tsam ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1404:249b-30: bar ma mchog gi bsdu ba dang gnas lnga'i go
T02D1404:249b-31: rims kyis de bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1404:249b-32: gsungs so // de la gnas lnga ni gsang ba dang mchog dang dgyes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1404:249b-33: we ta la sogs pa'i gnas lnga po de rnams kyi go rims ni gnas lnga'i go rims so //
T02D1404:249b-34: de bas na we ta la bsdus pa'i gnas lnga po zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1404:249b-35: de lta yin na par ma dang mchog thabs ma
T02D1404:249b-36: yin pa la brtson pa bdag cag dang 'dra ba
T02D1404:249b-37: rnams kyis rnyed par dka'o snyam na smras pa /
T02D1404:249b-38: blo ldan ri lu ma rnams mchod //
T02D1404:249b-39: ces bya ba la ri lu ma ni gzhon nu ma ste /
T02D1404:250a-0: rdo rje'i rigs la sogs pa las 'byung ba bshad pa'i rgyud las @250a * //
T02D1404:250a-1: gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid lo bcu gnyis pa brjed ngas med pa dpa' mo'o //
T02D1404:250a-2: rtag par khyad par dus su ni //
T02D1404:250a-3: zhes bya ba la dus ni dpyid kyi dus so //
T02D1404:250a-4: khyad par ni dpyid zla ra ba dang 'bring po la sogs pa'o //
T02D1404:250a-5: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1404:250a-6: khyad par ston zla zhes bya ba //
T02D1404:250a-7: ston dang dgun yang de bzhin te //
T02D1404:250a-8: yid las byung ba'i 'du shes nas //
T02D1404:250a-9: grol 'dod sbyor ba bya ba yin //
T02D1404:250a-10: de 'dod pas dus der rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchod do //
T02D1404:250a-11: de ma rnyed pa'i 'jigs pas shin tu blta bar bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1404:250a-12: gang la yang bshad par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ri
T02D1404:250a-13: dags kyi mig dang ldan pa de mi rnyed na
T02D1404:250a-14: dngos grub thob par bya ba'i phyir pho nya mo
T02D1404:250a-15: cig shos bstan par bya ba'i phyir smras pa /
T02D1404:250a-16: pho nya lhan cig skye dngos grub //
T02D1404:250a-17: tha ma mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1404:250a-18: de la mdor bsdus pa ni nag po tha ma
T02D1404:250a-19: dkar po 'bring de la grub pa ni grub pa'o
T02D1404:250a-20: // lhan cig skyes pa ni nag skya'i kha dog go //
T02D1404:250a-21: ljang gu ni mchog yin no //
T02D1404:250a-23: lha mo chen mo cig nyid de //
T02D1404:250a-24: de la stobs ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su
T02D1404:250a-25: shes shing mchod par bya zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D1404:250a-26: // lha mo de rnams kyang mchod pa na ci ltar mchod ce na smras pa /
T02D1404:250a-27: yid ni nang du chud pa yis //
T02D1404:250a-28: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1404:250a-29: nang du chud pa ni shes rab dang 'brel pa las ma 'das pa'i sems kyis brten par bya'o //
T02D1404:250a-30: dngos grub brtson zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1404:250a-31: mchod pa'i dgos pa bshad do //
T02D1404:250a-32: dngos grub thams cad la yang mthing ga kho na mchog yin na /
T02D1404:250a-33: nag po dang dkar po yang gang la sbyar snyam na smras pa /
T02D1404:250a-34: rang rdzas thig les sangs rgyas dang //
T02D1404:250a-35: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
T02D1404:250a-36: spyi'i dngos grub dang mi 'gal ba nag mo'am dkar
T02D1404:250a-37: mo'i mchod pa las skyes pa'i rang gi rdzas kyi
T02D1404:250a-38: thig le spros pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas ni rnam
T02D1404:250a-39: par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
T02D1404:250a-40: byang chub sems dpa' ni sa'i snying po la sogs pa'o //
T02D1404:250a-42: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mnyes par bya zhes dam tshig nye bar bstan to //
T02D1404:250a-44: dang po nad las grol ba dang //
T02D1404:250a-45: gnyis pa dam tshig spyod pa yin //
T02D1404:250a-46: gsum pa don ni du ma la //
T02D1404:250b-0: sgrub pa'i dbang po yon tan @250b gsal //
T02D1404:250b-1: yang na rdzogs pa'i rim pa rig pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1404:250b-2: pas ri lu ma zhes pa ni lhan cig skyes
T02D1404:250b-4: rtag tu zhes pa ni rgyun ma chad pa'o //
T02D1404:250b-5: dus khyad par du zhes pa ni so so rang gis rig pa'i skad cig ma'o //
T02D1404:250b-6: grub pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1404:250b-7: yid ni nang du chud pa ni /
T02D1404:250b-8: rang 'od shes rab ma dang yang dag par sbyor ba dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1404:250b-9: de lta bu'i rnam pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi sems kyis pho nya mo mchod la dga' ba spros te /
T02D1404:250b-10: brjod du med pa la dmigs zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1404:250b-12: cig shos yongs su rdzogs pa yi //
T02D1404:250b-13: rdzogs pa'i rim pa sgom pa pos //
T02D1404:250b-14: thog ma med pa'i nga rgyal gyis //
T02D1404:250b-15: rang bzhin med la rtag tu gnas //
T02D1404:250b-16: dus kyi nges pa med pa dang //
T02D1404:250b-17: ji snyed shes rab snyoms 'jug pa //
T02D1404:250b-18: bde gshegs thams cad 'byung ba dang //
T02D1404:250b-19: nang du chud pa'i yid kyis spyad //
T02D1404:250b-21: da ni pho nya mo'i dbye bas mchod pa'i lha dbye ba bstan pa'i phyir yang gsungs pa /
T02D1404:250b-22: lha mo mchod pa gsum du 'dod //
T02D1404:250b-23: tha ma chags pa'i tshul nyid kyis //
T02D1404:250b-24: rdo rje can rnams bsdus nas bya //
T02D1404:250b-25: btsun mo'i bha ga bde chen las //
T02D1404:250b-26: spros nas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
T02D1404:250b-28: de ltar phyogs gnyi ga la yang mchod pa 'di dgos pa ci zhig yin zhe na smras pa /
T02D1404:250b-29: mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang //
T02D1404:250b-30: thos pa dang ni dran pa yis //
T02D1404:250b-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pas rnal 'byor pa'i mchod
T02D1404:250b-32: pa la dga' ba'i rnal 'byor pa la 'jug pa'i
T02D1404:250b-33: phan yon bstan pa yin no //
T02D1404:250b-34: gal te dam tshig gi mchod pas 'bras bu yod
T02D1404:250b-35: na de'i phyir dam tshig srung ba dang mi srung
T02D1404:250b-36: ba'i yon tan dang skyon smras pa /
T02D1404:250b-37: rtag tu dam tshig bskyang bar bya //
T02D1404:250b-38: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dam tshig bsrungs
T02D1404:250b-39: pas yon tan yod na dam tshig de gang yin
T02D1404:250b-41: khrag chen ga pur bcas pa dang //
T02D1404:250b-42: tsandan dmar po dang sbyar ba //
T02D1404:250b-43: tshogs kyi nang du zhugs pa na //
T02D1404:250b-44: thams cad bcud kyis len du gnas //
T02D1404:250b-45: zhes bya ba ni khrag chen ni rang byung me tog go //
T02D1404:250b-46: ga pur dang bcas pa ni byang chub kyi sems dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1404:250b-47: tsandan dmar po ni sha chen no //
T02D1404:250b-48: tshogs ni rnal 'byor pa'i bshad pa'i las dang /
T02D1404:250b-49: rtags dang mig la sogs pa dbang po lnga las byung ba yin no //
T02D1404:251a-0: @251a * // tshogs de'i dbus su zhugs pa ni 'dres pa ste ro gcig pa'o //
T02D1404:251a-1: gcig dang gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi dang lnga las mchog ni thams cad mchog go //
T02D1404:251a-2: de gang zhe na smras ga bcud kyis len zhes
T02D1404:251a-3: pa ni de la bcud ni 'dod chags chen po'i
T02D1404:251a-4: rang bzhin no // de yang sbom pa dang phra ba'i dbye bas rnam pa gnyis so //
T02D1404:251a-5: de la sbom pa ni rdzas kyi bye brag gis rnam pa dgu'o //
T02D1404:251a-7: khams rnams sgyur bar byed pa'i phyir gcig pu tshon gyi khyad par ro //
T02D1404:251a-8: len pa ni khams rnams bsdu ba ste bcud kyis len no //
T02D1404:251a-9: de lta na yang khrag chen po la sogs pa'i
T02D1404:251a-10: tshig 'jig rten gyi skad kyis yongs su gzung ba
T02D1404:251a-12: 'on te de ltar ma yin par bshad snyam pa
T02D1404:251a-13: la dogs pa spang ba'i phyir bshad pa'i rgyud las
T02D1404:251a-14: gsungs pa'i brda skad smras pa /
T02D1404:251a-15: khrag chen me tog nyid yin te //
T02D1404:251a-16: dpyid kyi dus su gang byung ba //
T02D1404:251a-17: ga pur shu kra zhes bshad pa //
T02D1404:251a-18: sha chen tsandan dmar po yin //
T02D1404:251a-19: dbang po thams cad las byung ba //
T02D1404:251a-20: tshogs zhes bya bar rab tu grags //
T02D1404:251a-21: stong pa'i stong pa snang med gang //
T02D1404:251a-22: bcud rigs bcud kyis len gyi mchog / sbom dang phra ba'i bye brag gis //
T02D1404:251a-23: de nyid khyad par gnyis su song //
T02D1404:251a-24: sbo ma brdzas [?] ni rnam pa dgu //
T02D1404:251a-25: rdzas kyi dbye bas 'jug par byed //
T02D1404:251a-26: rdul ni tshon gyi khyad par te //
T02D1404:251a-28: ces bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
T02D1404:251a-29: bcud kyis len 'dis ci bya zhe na /
T02D1404:251a-31: mthe bong ming med gdong gis ni //
T02D1404:251a-32: rnal 'byor rig pas ldag par bya //
T02D1404:251a-34: de ming med ni lha mo ches 'byung ba'i yan lag mchog go //
T02D1404:251a-35: mthe bong ni skyes bu'i gsal byed de rdo rje'o //
T02D1404:251a-36: de gnyis kyi gdong ni ming med dang mthe bo'i gdong ste /
T02D1404:251a-37: de gnyis kyis bdag par bya ba ni myang bar bya ba'i don to //
T02D1404:251a-38: rnal 'byor ni sbyor ba ste phan tshun phrad pa'o //
T02D1404:251a-39: de shes pas na rig pa ste /
T02D1404:251a-42: khyi la sogs pa lta bu'i sbyor ba 'dis ci 'grub ce na /
T02D1404:251a-44: slob dpon rnams sam bshad pa'i rgyud kyi rigs pa
T02D1404:251a-45: ci lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar bya'o
T02D1404:251a-46: // de la bshad pa'i rgyud las kyang /
T02D1404:251b-0: skyed byed mgon @251b za'i tshad tsam ni //
T02D1404:251b-1: rgya mtsho de bzhin nyis 'gyur dang //
T02D1404:251b-2: bzhi 'gyur ral pa can sbyin bya //
T02D1404:251b-3: dbang byed bldag pa'i cho ga mchog / ces bya
T02D1404:251b-4: ba la sogs pa'i bldag pa'i cho gas bshad pa'i
T02D1404:251b-5: dngos grub ci mi 'grub ce na /
T02D1404:251b-7: zla ba'i btung ba bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1404:251b-8: zla ba ni nang gi bdud rtsi'i bdag nyid lha
T02D1404:251b-9: rnams kyi btung ba'i phyir zla ba'i btung ba ste
T02D1404:251b-10: mchog yin no // ji ltar zla ba'i btung ba
T02D1404:251b-11: 'jig rten du ji ltar mi 'gal bar grub pa
T02D1404:251b-12: de bzhin du 'dir shes par bya'o //
T02D1404:251b-13: dngos grub rtag pa thob par 'gyur //
T02D1404:251b-14: zhes bya ba ni bskal pa du mar rgas pa dang /
T02D1404:251b-17: ci tshe ring ba tsam gyis 'bras bu yin nam snyam pa la smras pa /
T02D1404:251b-19: zhes bya ba ni de la dgongs pa 'di yin te /
T02D1404:251b-20: lha dang lha ma yin rnams bcud kyis len gcig
T02D1404:251b-21: pus mchog tu 'dzin pa'i lta ba dang ldan pas
T02D1404:251b-23: 'di ni rtag pa dang chud pa'i lta ba las
T02D1404:251b-24: 'das pa'i mi 'chi bcu phyed spros pa med pa'i
T02D1404:251b-25: mi 'chi bcu phyed kyis dngos grub mi 'grub pa
T02D1404:251b-26: med de thams cad 'grub ces de'i phyir smras pa
T02D1404:251b-29: da ni dngos grub thams cad bzhag ste /
T02D1404:251b-30: bcud kyis len gyi dngos grub gcig pu kho na
T02D1404:251b-31: bsgrub par bya zhes dogs pa rnams la dngos grub
T02D1404:251b-32: kyi rgyu la 'jug pa'i phyir smras pa /
T02D1404:251b-33: mchod bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
T02D1404:251b-34: rdo rje bzhi yis mchod bzhi'o //
T02D1404:251b-35: de ya rdo rje bzhi ni /
T02D1404:251b-36: dang po stong nyid byang chub ste //
T02D1404:251b-37: gnyis pa sa bon bsdus pa'o //
T02D1404:251b-38: gsum gzugs brnyan rdzogs pa ste //
T02D1404:251b-39: bzhi pa yi ge dgod pa'o //
T02D1404:251b-40: stong pa nyid kyi byang chub kyi sems nas brtsams te /
T02D1404:251b-41: gzugs brnyan rdzogs pa'i bar du mchod pa bzhi zhes bya'o //
T02D1404:251b-42: sgrub pa po bde ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir bdag
T02D1404:251b-43: dang gzhan gyi don du dus bzhir mchod pa bya'o
T02D1404:251b-45: dbang po gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa ni zhes bya ba la /
T02D1404:251b-46: dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang /
T02D1404:251b-47: de tsam gyi dpa' mo rnams kyi yang dag par sbyor bas snyoms par 'jug pa ni mchod pa'o //
T02D1404:252a-0: de nyid 'dzin ces bya ba ni de kho na nyid rig pas @252a * //
T02D1404:252a-3: mkha' 'gro ma sogs de bzhin no //
T02D1404:252a-4: lha mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi rnams //
T02D1404:252a-5: byang chub sems kyis bskyed pa yi //
T02D1404:252a-6: rim pa bsgoms pas dus bzhi la //
T02D1404:252a-7: bde ba'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir //
T02D1404:252a-8: sgom pa pos ni mchod par bya //
T02D1404:252a-9: dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba dpa' bo dang dpa'
T02D1404:252a-10: mo gnyis su med pa'i mchod pa 'dis cir 'gyur
T02D1404:252a-12: lha dang mi'i bde ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1404:252a-14: dngos grub thams cad kyi rang bzhin grub par 'gyur gyi /
T02D1404:252a-15: mi'i dngos po nyid du smos ci dgos //
T02D1404:252a-16: de la dngos grub mang du 'dod pa dgos pa med ces bya ba'i don to //
T02D1404:252a-17: ci de ltar gdon mi za bar 'gyur ram zhe na smras pa /
T02D1404:252a-18: bsdus byas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi //
T02D1404:252a-19: zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems spros pas
T02D1404:252a-20: bsdus pa byas pa'i bde ba 'di ni mi nyid
T02D1404:252a-22: byang chub sems 'di rdo rje ste //
T02D1404:252a-23: bu mo lte ba'i spro ba brtag / ces bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
T02D1404:252a-24: de bas na ci ltar bshad pa bzhin du gzhan du mi 'gyur zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02D1404:252a-25: bcu drug char yang mi phod ces bya ba ni /
T02D1404:252a-26: rnal 'byor gzhan la zhen pa'i gang zag rnams kyi
T02D1404:252a-27: mi dmigs pa'i cha bcu drug pa yang rig par
T02D1404:252a-29: 'on kyang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub mchog gi snod du rung ba ji ltar 'gyur /
T02D1404:252a-30: de lta yin na de'i tshe mchod pa 'di gang du bya zhe na /
T02D1404:252a-31: gnas kyi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir smras pa /
T02D1404:252a-32: ri su la tshang tshing phug rnams dang //
T02D1404:252a-33: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
T02D1404:252a-34: kun rdzob tu yi ge'i don ni go sla bsam bstan to //
T02D1404:252a-35: dam pa'i don du bshad par bya ste /
T02D1404:252a-36: de la mu stegs la byung ba'i bdag nyid dang /
T02D1404:252a-39: gang zag la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis mi g-yo ba'i phyir ri bo'o //
T02D1404:252a-40: sems can dman pa rnams kyis bgrod par dka' ba'i phyir tshang tshing ngo //
T02D1404:252a-42: zab pa'i phyir phug rnams so //
T02D1404:252a-43: mchod pa bzhi'i gzhir gyur pa gong du bshad pa'i
T02D1404:252a-44: lha mo bzhi'i padma chen po ni chu'i dogs so
T02D1404:252a-46: tsakra waka la sogs pa'i 'dab chags kyi tshogs lta
T02D1404:252a-47: bu'i rgyal ba'i tshogs kyi gnas yin pa'i phyir ro
T02D1404:252b-0: // ri su la tshang tshing la sogs @252b pa ste ;
T02D1404:252b-1: de kho na nyid goms pa'i gnas so //
T02D1404:252b-2: gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod ni dang po nas
T02D1404:252b-3: rtag tu yongs su grub pa'i skye ba dang 'jig
T02D1404:252b-4: pa las 'das pa shes rab kyi mtshan ma de
T02D1404:252b-5: nyid sems can thams cad kyi rgyud kyi bag chags
T02D1404:252b-6: kyi gnas yin pa'i phyir dur khrod do / der
T02D1404:252b-9: der ni dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
T02D1404:252b-10: zhes bya ba ni de la dkyil 'khor rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D1404:252b-12: byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor te //
T02D1404:252b-13: bri bar bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1404:252b-14: slob dpon dka' rgyal zla bas mdzad pa'i rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel las /
T02D1404:252b-15: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa'i le'u ste dang po'o /
T02D1404:252b-17: // / da ni dpal he ru ka'i mngon par 'byung
T02D1404:252b-18: ba zhes bya ba'i le'u gnyis par bde mchog gi
T02D1404:252b-19: man ngag gtso bor gyur pa gang yin pa de'i
T02D1404:252b-20: rtsa ba bsdus te bstan par bya ba'i phyir bshad
T02D1404:252b-21: par bya ste / de la chu dang lci bas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1404:252b-22: der zhes bya ba ni ri dang phug la sogs pa'i gnas su'o //
T02D1404:252b-23: chu zhes bya ba ni chu nyid do //
T02D1404:252b-24: chu dang lce bas byugs pa'i sa brkos nas bkang
T02D1404:252b-25: zhing legs par brdungs pa'i sa yongs su gzung bar
T02D1404:252b-26: bya ste / thog mar byug cing dur khrod kyi
T02D1404:252b-27: thal bas bsres pa'i bdud rtsi lngas slar yang dkyil
T02D1404:252b-28: 'khor gyi sa gzhi legs par byug par bya'o zhes
T02D1404:252b-29: bya ste / pa'o // de'i 'og tu dkyil 'khor
T02D1404:252b-30: gyi phyi rol du dur khrod brgyad kyi gnas nye
T02D1404:252b-31: bar brtag cing dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab par bya
T02D1404:252b-32: ba'i phyir bshad pa'i rgyud las bcom ldan 'das kyis
T02D1404:252b-33: bya ste / pa'o // gsungs pa ni / cha ni bgo ba'i rim pa yis //
T02D1404:252b-34: blo dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D1404:252b-35: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1404:252b-36: cha gsum du bgo ba ni gsum du bgo ba ste /
T02D1404:252b-37: de'i rim pa ni cha gsum du bgo ba'i rim pa'o //
T02D1404:252b-38: cha bgo ba'i rim pa des dkyil 'khor thig gdab par bya ba yin gyi /
T02D1404:252b-39: rim pa ma yin pa ni ma yin no zhes bstan to //
T02D1404:252b-40: de la cha bgo ba de nyid kyang mi shes na de'i rim pa gang gis shes par 'gyur /
T02D1404:252b-41: de'i phyir dkyil 'khor 'di ni yongs su shes par
T02D1404:252b-42: mi 'gyur snyam na de la sems can mgu ba
T02D1404:252b-43: dang smin par bya ba'i phyir cha bgo ba'i rim
T02D1404:253a-0: bar mtshams nas ni re'u mig @253a * //
T02D1404:253a-2: cha bgo ba ni rab bsgrub bya //
T02D1404:253a-3: bdun dang drug pa lnga pa yi //
T02D1404:253a-4: rim las cha rnams bgo bar bya //
T02D1404:253a-5: de ltar dkyil 'khor thig btab nas /
T02D1404:253a-6: tshon dgye ba'i rim pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1404:253a-7: dur khrod sol ba'i phye ma yis //
T02D1404:253a-8: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1404:253a-9: dur khrod kyi sol bas tshon nag po bya'o //
T02D1404:253a-10: dur khrod kyi so phag gis tshon dmar po bya'o //
T02D1404:253a-11: zhes dam tshig bsrung ba'i don du tshon gnyis dgod
T02D1404:253a-12: pa ni rgyud thams cad kyi thun mong yin no
T02D1404:253a-13: // ljang gu dang dkar po dang ser po dang
T02D1404:253a-14: lnga ste de rnams kyis dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o
T02D1404:253a-16: phyogs rmongs pa la sogs pa spom pa dang /
T02D1404:253a-18: chad pa la sogs pa las 'das pa'o //
T02D1404:253a-19: de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor gang gis bri zhe na /
T02D1404:253a-20: slob dpon zhes bya ba la /
T02D1404:253a-21: dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi khyad par ro //
T02D1404:253a-22: mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla ste /
T02D1404:253a-23: mang pos ci zhig bya zhes pa'o //
T02D1404:253a-24: bshad pa'i khyad par gyis khyad par can gyi dpal he ru kar bdag nyid bya ba yin gyi /
T02D1404:253a-25: so so'i skye bo'i nga rgyal gyis ni ma yin no //
T02D1404:253a-26: de bas na dpal he ru ka dran par byas la /
T02D1404:253a-27: bdag nyid dpal he ru ka'i rnam pa thob par
T02D1404:253a-28: tha mal pa'i ming brjed pa'i phyir deng nas brtsams
T02D1404:253a-29: te / rang nyid dpal he ru kar dran par
T02D1404:253a-30: bya zhing sum cu rtsa drug pa'i lha'i 'khor los
T02D1404:253a-31: sgyur ba thams cad bdag nyid yin no zhes pa'o
T02D1404:253a-32: te / // dkyil 'khor ji ltar bri bar bya zhe na /
T02D1404:253a-34: ces bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
T02D1404:253a-35: 'khor lo ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo ste /
T02D1404:253a-36: gzhi dang gzhi can gyi mtshan nyid snying ga zhes bya ba la /
T02D1404:253a-37: nang gi yan lag dang nying lag pull'i ra m'a
T02D1404:253a-38: la sogs pa'i gnas gang yin pa der bkod cing
T02D1404:253a-40: de'i 'og tu dkyil 'khor bri ba la /
T02D1404:253a-41: rang gi yan lag la bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor can gyi bya ba ston pa yin te /
T02D1404:253a-42: bdag nyid de ltar go bgos nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
T02D1404:253a-43: de ltar bshad pa'i rim pas dpal he ru ka'i
T02D1404:253a-44: rnam pa dang ldan pas bdud kyi tshogs rnam par
T02D1404:253a-45: pham par byas nas go cha dgod pa'i bdag nyid
T02D1404:253a-46: can gyis dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi la 'og dang steng
T02D1404:253b-0: dang logs @253b rnams kyi dbye ba bstan pa yin
T02D1404:253b-1: te / ra ba rnams kyi phyogs su dgod //
T02D1404:253b-3: ra ba ni rdo rje'i ra ba'o //
T02D1404:253b-4: phyogs zhes bya ba ni phyogs rnams la'o //
T02D1404:253b-5: 'og tu mtshon cha zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor
T02D1404:253b-6: gyis dgod pa'i phyir mtshon cha ste rdo rje'i sa
T02D1404:253b-8: 'khor lo rang gi bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1404:253b-9: rang gi bdag nyid ni dpal he ru ka'i rnal
T02D1404:253b-10: 'byor dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i sku gang du
T02D1404:253b-11: bdag por gyur pa der 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'khor
T02D1404:253b-12: lo'o // gi zhes bya ba la ni gzhi gcig pa'i drug pa'o //
T02D1404:253b-13: yang na 'khor lo'am bdag nyid kyi 'og dang steng
T02D1404:253b-14: du rang dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor pas rab
T02D1404:253b-15: la sogs pa dgod ces tshig rnam par sbyar bar
T02D1404:253b-17: bdag nyid mkha' 'gro'i dra ba byas //
T02D1404:253b-19: steng dang 'og ces bya ba ni bdag nyid kyi'o //
T02D1404:253b-20: mkha' 'gro'i dra ba ni rdo rje'i rab yin no //
T02D1404:253b-21: de ltar go bgos zhes bya ba ni go cha
T02D1404:253b-22: drug gis bdag nyid la bkod na 'gro ba lnga
T02D1404:253b-23: las 'das pa'i sum cu rtsa gsum pas mi phyed
T02D1404:253b-24: par 'gyur ro // sngags dang phyag rgyas rnam brgyan nas //
T02D1404:253b-26: sngags kyi rnam par dag pa'i phyag rgyas brgyan pa'i
T02D1404:253b-27: slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor bri bar ba zhes tshig
T02D1404:253b-29: dkyil 'khor rtsom pa'i dus su rdo rje ra ba
T02D1404:253b-30: la sogs pa bya ba'i phyir bshad pa yin gyi
T02D1404:253b-31: gzhan du dgos pa med do //
T02D1404:253b-32: de byed par 'dod pas 'di dag thams cad ming
T02D1404:253b-33: gi rgyud bla ma las drangs te bshad par 'gyur
T02D1404:253b-34: ba'i dpal he ru ka'i mngon par rtogs pa las
T02D1404:253b-36: 'jigs pa zhes bya ba ni ro langs gar byed pa dang /
T02D1404:253b-40: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug rol pa dang /
T02D1404:253b-42: dug gi sgra 'byin pa'i sprul rgyu ba dang /
T02D1404:253b-43: phet dang phat kyi sgra 'byin cing brgyug pa'i stag dang /
T02D1404:253b-44: dom mang po la sogs pas gang ba'i dur khrod kyis 'jigs par byed pa'o //
T02D1404:253b-45: dngos grub chen po rab ster ba'i //
T02D1404:253b-46: zhes bya ba la rdo rje'i ra ba la sogs
T02D1404:253b-47: pa 'dzin pa'i phun sum tshogs pa sgrub par byed
T02D1404:253b-48: cing 'dod pa thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor bri
T02D1404:254a-0: gang gi tshe gang gis dkyil @254a * //
T02D1404:254a-1: 'khor 'di bri bar bya zhe na smras pa /

T02D1404:254a-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1404:254a-4: des nas ni rdo rje'i rab la sogs pa'i 'og tu'o //
T02D1404:254a-5: sems med srang bu ni sha chen dang khrag gis
T02D1404:254a-6: spags pa'i ring du lon pa'i sems med pa'i srad
T02D1404:254a-7: bus thig gdab po zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1404:254a-8: dpal he ru ka'i dkyil 'khor 'di tshad ci tsam du bri zhe na /
T02D1404:254a-9: de'i tshad bshad par bya ste /
T02D1404:254a-10: khru bzhi pa'am khru brgyad pa //
T02D1404:254a-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T02D1404:254a-12: khru bzhi pa la sogs pa'i tshad dang ldan pa'i
T02D1404:254a-13: dkyil 'khor gyi thig skud de tsam gyi tshad du
T02D1404:254a-14: bya ba'am / 'on te de bas lhag pa zhig bya snyam na smras pa /
T02D1404:254a-15: sngags pa'i nyis 'gyur rnam dpyad cing //
T02D1404:254a-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1404:254a-17: tshad las nyis 'gyur brgyad khru brgyad kyi nyis 'gyur
T02D1404:254a-18: bcu drug gi tshad rab tu brkyang bar bya zhes
T02D1404:254a-21: dkyil 'khor gyi phyed ni dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1404:254a-22: dkyil 'khor gyi nang gi rim pa ni 'khor lo ste /
T02D1404:254a-23: de'i tshad khru bzhi yin gyi ma lus pa ni ma yin no //
T02D1404:254a-24: des na phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi rim pa yongs su
T02D1404:254a-25: gzung bar bya ba'i phyir 'di ni dkyil 'khor thams
T02D1404:254a-26: cad kyi thun mong yin pas nyis 'gyur bshad pa
T02D1404:254a-27: skyon med do // 'on te dgos pa yod na
T02D1404:254a-28: ni skyon dang yon tan dpyad pa yin na lha'i
T02D1404:254a-29: 'khor lo bsgoms pa la ni dkyil 'khor 'di dgos
T02D1404:254a-32: lha'i 'khor lo ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor
T02D1404:254a-33: yang byang chub sgrub po zhes bstan pa'i phyir bshad
T02D1404:254a-34: pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par
T02D1404:254a-35: dag pa bstan pa la 'jug par bya ste /
T02D1404:254a-36: sa yi cha ni spyan yin te //
T02D1404:254a-37: thig skud rnam par snang mdzad bshad //
T02D1404:254a-38: rdul ni sna tshogs rigs zhes bya //
T02D1404:254a-39: de bzhin mchod pa sna tshogs rnams //
T02D1404:254a-42: au dyan gsung gi 'khor lo ste //
T02D1404:254a-43: sku yi 'khor lo aa ra bu da //
T02D1404:254a-44: go d'a ba ri zur bzhi ste //
T02D1404:254a-45: ra me shva ra me yi mtshams //
T02D1404:254a-46: de b'i ko t'i bden bral bshad //
T02D1404:254a-47: m'a la ba ni rlung gi mtshams //
T02D1404:254a-48: dbang ldan mtshams ni k'a ma ru //
T02D1404:254a-50: shar gyi sgo ni ao te ste //
T02D1404:254a-51: de bzhin lho ni bya gsum bshad //
T02D1404:254a-52: nub phyogs sgo ni ko sa la //
T02D1404:254b-0: ka ling @254b ka ni de bzhin byang //
T02D1404:254b-1: shar gyi rta babs lamp'a ka //
T02D1404:254b-2: k'anytsi lho yi rta babs yin //
T02D1404:254b-3: ha m'a la ya nub phyogs su //
T02D1404:254b-4: byang gi rta babs yi dags grong //
T02D1404:254b-5: lha yi snam bu gri ha de //
T02D1404:254b-6: rin chen snam bu soo r'ashte //
T02D1404:254b-7: dra dang dra phyer snam bu ni //
T02D1404:254b-8: gser gling nyid du bshad pa yin //
T02D1404:254b-9: rnga yab g-yer kha rgyal mtshan dang //
T02D1404:254b-10: gdugs dang ba dan grong khyer gsum //
T02D1404:254b-11: rdo rje thig ni zlum po ste //
T02D1404:254b-12: sin dhu nyid du bshad pa yin //
T02D1404:254b-13: kha khyer de bzhin mya ngam ste //
T02D1404:254b-14: rin chen rdo rje ku lu t'a //
T02D1404:254b-15: de ltar dkyil 'khor dam pa bri //
T02D1404:254b-16: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi la //
T02D1404:254b-17: rta babs bzhi pos rnam par brgyan //
T02D1404:254b-18: dra ba dra phyed kyis mdzes pa //
T02D1404:254b-19: g-yer kha'i phreng dang rnga yab brgyan //
T02D1404:254b-20: zur gyi cha ni thams cad dang //
T02D1404:254b-21: sgo dang kha khyer rta babs rnams //
T02D1404:254b-22: rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis mdzes //
T02D1404:254b-23: mtshams rnams thams cad skyon med pa //
T02D1404:254b-24: sku yi 'khor lor sku dbang phyug / gsung gi 'khor lor snang mtha' yas //
T02D1404:254b-25: mi bskyod thugs kyi 'khor lor te //
T02D1404:254b-27: phyi yi 'khor lor gzugs rnams la //
T02D1404:254b-28: rnam par snang mdzad rnam par bsgom //
T02D1404:254b-29: sku yi 'khor lo tshor ba ste //
T02D1404:254b-32: padma don yod rnam shes so //
T02D1404:254b-33: ri mo lnga ni gang yin pa //
T02D1404:254b-34: shin tu rnam dag rang bzhin no //
T02D1404:254b-35: re'u mig thams cad sar dgod pa //
T02D1404:254b-36: lus kyi rnam dag bsgom par bya //
T02D1404:254b-37: ri mo nyi shu phyogs bzhi sa //
T02D1404:254b-38: dpa' bo'i rnam par dag pa yin //
T02D1404:254b-40: rdo rje phag mo lte ba ste //
T02D1404:254b-41: sa bon zhes grags khrag 'thung mchog /'dab ma mkha' 'gro ma'i rang bzhin //
T02D1404:254b-42: dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor rnams kyi mchog / sum cu rtsa bdun rnam dag pa'i //
T02D1404:254b-44: ri mo'i dkyil 'khor dang po ste //
T02D1404:254b-45: gnyis pa mtshan ma'i dkyil 'khor yin //
T02D1404:254b-46: lag pa'i phyag rgya gsum pa ste //
T02D1404:254b-47: gzugs brnyan dgod pa bzhi pa'o //
T02D1404:254b-48: me tog bkram pa lnga pa ste //
T02D1404:254b-49: drug pa tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1404:254b-50: dbus kyi padma lte bar bcas //
T02D1404:254b-51: rab tu dga' ba'i sa yin no //
T02D1404:254b-52: thugs kyi 'khor lo dri ma med //
T02D1404:255a-3: de bzhin gru bzhi spyad dka' ba //
T02D1404:255a-4: lha yi rnam bu mngon du gyur //
T02D1404:255a-5: sgo bzhi ring du song ba ste //
T02D1404:255a-6: zur gyi cha ni mi g-yo ba //
T02D1404:255a-7: legs pa'i blo gros rdo rje'i thig / rta babs chos kyi sprin zhes bshad //
T02D1404:255a-8: dkyil 'khor de nyid dam pa ste //
T02D1404:255a-9: khrag 'thung ye shes bla med pa'o //
T02D1404:255a-11: phag mo'i sku las yang dag 'byung //
T02D1404:255a-12: ri dang phug dang nags tshal dang //
T02D1404:255a-13: chu bo'i 'gram dang bzhi mdo dang //
T02D1404:255a-14: rgya mtsho'i dogs ni yid 'ong dang //
T02D1404:255a-15: shing gcig drung dang zhi gnas su //
T02D1404:255a-16: gnas ni nye bar mtshon byas nas //
T02D1404:255a-18: de nyid de ni rnal 'byor brtsam //
T02D1404:255a-19: 'dod pa thams cad rab ster ba'o //
T02D1404:255a-20: snying gi mkha' dbyings pad gnas par //
T02D1404:255a-21: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya //

T02D1404:255a-23: ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid zhi //
T02D1404:255a-24: 'od zer sna tshogs lnga yi bdag / kun nas 'od ni rnam par spro //
T02D1404:255a-25: sems tsam la ni nges par gnas //
T02D1404:255a-26: byang chub tshogs ni sgrub byed pa //
T02D1404:255a-27: nam mkha'i dbyings nas yid 'ong par //
T02D1404:255a-28: dkyil 'khor mchog ni bltas nas su //
T02D1404:255a-29: til gyi gang bu dang mtshungs pa'i //
T02D1404:255a-30: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' mchod //
T02D1404:255a-31: 'gro ba ris drug sems can rnams //
T02D1404:255a-32: bla med go 'phang thob par shog / de yi 'og tu skyabs 'gro zhing //
T02D1404:255a-33: dam bcas pa yang bya ba yi //
T02D1404:255a-34: khrag 'thung sangs rgyas bdag grub cing //
T02D1404:255a-35: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02D1404:255a-36: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dag la ni //
T02D1404:255a-37: de nas rnam par gnas par bya //
T02D1404:255a-38: sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin dmigs shing //
T02D1404:255a-39: rtse gcig pa yi sems kyis so //
T02D1404:255a-40: phyi dang nang gi chos rnams kun //
T02D1404:255a-41: stong pa nyid du blta par bya //
T02D1404:255a-42: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atmako& ham /
T02D1404:255a-43: mig yor tsam gyi rnam shes ni //
T02D1404:255a-44: sems tsam du ni rnam par brtag / ji srid sa 'og mthar thug par //
T02D1404:255a-45: rlung gi 'khor lo bsam par bya //
T02D1404:255a-46: yi ge yom las yang dag byung //
T02D1404:255a-47: gzhu yi dbyibs can kha dog sngo //
T02D1404:255a-48: de yang ba dang yis mtshan zhing //
T02D1404:255a-49: du ba'i phreng ba kun du 'khrigs //
T02D1404:255a-50: de steng yi ge rom las skyes //
T02D1404:255a-51: me yi dkyil 'khor mchog tu bsgom //
T02D1404:255b-0: gru gsum kha @255b dog dmar ba ste //
T02D1404:255b-2: rdo rje yis ni rnam par mtshan //
T02D1404:255b-3: nyi ma bye ba dang mtshungs mchog / de yi steng du chu'i dkyil 'khor //
T02D1404:255b-4: zlum po 'od zer phreng bas khyab //
T02D1404:255b-5: kha ba'i kha dog dang mtshungs pa //
T02D1404:255b-6: bom byung bum pas mtshan pa'o //
T02D1404:255b-7: de yi steng du sa yi ni //
T02D1404:255b-8: dkyil 'khor lom las byung ba'i mchog //
T02D1404:255b-9: gru bzhi sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan //
T02D1404:255b-11: de yi steng du ri rab mchog / rnam par bsgom pa nyid du bya //
T02D1404:255b-12: rin chen sna bdun rang bzhin lta //
T02D1404:255b-13: rtse mo brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes //
T02D1404:255b-14: yi ge sum las yang dag 'byung //
T02D1404:255b-16: rdo rje rab rdo rje dra //
T02D1404:255b-17: rdo rje sa gzhi bla re dang //
T02D1404:255b-18: mnga' yi dra bas byin brlabs shing //
T02D1404:255b-19: phyi rol me yi phreng ba bsam //
T02D1404:255b-20: aom me di n'i badzr'i bha ba badzra bandha h'um /
T02D1404:255b-21: aom badzra pr'a k'a ra h'um bam h'um /
T02D1404:255b-22: aom badzra banytsa ra h'um bom h'um /
T02D1404:255b-23: aom badzra bi t'a na h'um khom h'um /
T02D1404:255b-24: aom badzra sha ra dz'a la tr'om som tr'om /
T02D1404:255b-25: aom badzra dzva l'a na l'arka hum h'um h'um /
T02D1404:255b-27: rtsibs brgyad drang por 'bar ba'i mchog / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa //

T02D1404:255b-29: de nas khro bo brgyad po spro //
T02D1404:255b-30: rim dang rim las bzlog par dgod //
T02D1404:255b-31: rdo rje drag po rdo rje nyid //
T02D1404:255b-32: de bzhin rdo rje gtsug tor nyid //
T02D1404:255b-33: rdo rje bdud rtsi gnod sbyin dang //

T02D1404:282a-42: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //

T02D1404:282a-45: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /

T02D1404:282b-0: yang na chos kyi brda @282b ni bdud rtsi lnga'o //
T02D1404:282b-1: sems can gyi don la chags pa ni khrag go //

T02D1404:282b-26: gshin rje ma dang skrag byed ma dang //
T02D1404:282b-32: kye ma 'di ni shin tu ngo mtshar byed pa'i

T02D1404:283b-20: rnal 'byor ma bdun ni 'khor lo thams cad kyi rnal 'byor ma ste /

T02D1404:284a-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //

T02D1404:298b-40: rig pa'i rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba'i rdo rje

T02D1404:299a-0: @299a * // padma'i lte ba'i dbus gnas par //

T02D1404:299a-6: thod pa'i phreng bar yang dag ldan //

T02D1404:299a-8: sangs rgyas lnga yi spyi gtsug can //

T02D1404:299a-21: zhags pa sdigs mdzub 'khor lo dang //

T02D1404:299a-26: rang 'od rig pa'i bde thob pa //

T02D1404:300a-4: du khyi dang phag la sogs pa'i sha skye bo

T02D1404:300a-6: cad byed pa zhes bstan to //

T02D1404:300a-45: dpa' bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

T02D1404:300b-1: rtsa bzhir khyad par du 'gro bas na dpa' bo

T02D1404:300b-3: la 'gro bas na dpa' bo ste /

T02D1404:300b-6: zla ba phyed pas dbu la brgyan //

T02D1404:300b-9: ci'i phyir phyed yin la rgyas pa ma yin zhe na /
T02D1404:300b-10: dpa' bo rnams kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
T02D1404:300b-11: dpa' bo rnams dang dam tshig so sor yin pa'i phyir /
T02D1404:300b-12: dpa' bo dag gi zla ba rgyas pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba yin gyi /
T02D1404:300b-13: bcom ldan 'das la de ma bstan to //
T02D1404:300b-14: zla ba phyed pa de ci lta bu zhe na /
T02D1404:300b-15: dpa' bo skyes pa las zhes bya ba ni dpa'
T02D1404:300b-16: bo rnams gang las skyes pa de ni dpa' bo

T02D1404:300b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

T02D1404:300b-27: sgrub pa po yi lag g-yon gyis //
T02D1404:300b-29: g-yas brkyang ba las gzhan ba ni lag g-yon no //
T02D1404:300b-30: sgrub pa po ni phyag rgya'i dngos grub sgrub par byed pa'o //

T02D1404:300b-32: g-yon pa kho nas yin gyi /
T02D1404:300b-33: g-yas pas ma yin zhes nges pa gang zhe na /
T02D1404:300b-34: 'di ni dpa' bo'i gnas yin te //

T02D1404:300b-37: g-yon pa kho nas nges bar 'byed de /

T02D1404:300b-39: g-yon yang de'i bde ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1404:300b-40: 'gro kun g-yon las byung ba yin //

T02D1404:300b-42: bshad pa'i rim pas g-yon pa de re zhig bzhag nas brda ji ltar bstan zhe na /

T02D1404:300b-44: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /

T02D1404:301a-2: khyab par byed par don yod grub pa dang /
T02D1404:301a-3: drug brjod cing go rims su mthe bo la sogs pa brda' lnga bstan par bya'o //

T02D1404:301a-7: bza' ba'i dus su dgod par bya'o //
T02D1404:301a-8: mi 'da' ba'i rnam par dag pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1404:301a-9: sa ni spyan zhes bya bar bshad //
T02D1404:301a-10: ces bya ba la sogs pa smos so //

T02D1404:304a-41: ba'o zhes bya'o // gong du bshad pa'i brda'i gdong bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1404:304a-42: khanda ro h'a phyi rol sbyin //
T02D1404:304a-43: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1404:304a-44: dum skyes mas nye bar mtshon pa'i gdong ni khanda ro h'a'o //
T02D1404:304a-45: de'i phyi rol ni khanda ro h'a'i phyi rol lo //
T02D1404:304a-46: de nas khanda ro h'a'i phyi rol las /
T02D1404:304b-0: le le ha na ni @304b gdong bzhi pa la sbyin bar bya'o //
T02D1404:304b-2: bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin gyi bsreg bya lnga'i rdzas
T02D1404:304b-3: 'khor lo'i nang na gnas pa'i dpa' bo brda'i zhal
T02D1404:304b-4: du bsreg bya de dag zhugs par blta zhing bsam
T02D1404:304b-5: par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1404:304b-6: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba las /
T02D1404:304b-7: pho nya mo dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyin sreg
T02D1404:304b-8: dang dgug pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa
T02D1404:304b-10: / pho nya mo dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyin sreg dang /
T02D1404:304b-11: dgug pa'i cho ga brjod nas /
T02D1404:304b-12: dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba bzlog pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1404:304b-13: le'u sum cu rtsa lnga pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1404:304b-14: de nas las kyi mchog rab ni //
T02D1404:304b-15: ci bzhin rim gyis mtshon pa ste //
T02D1404:304b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa la /
T02D1404:304b-17: las kyi mchog rab ni las kyi mchog go //
T02D1404:304b-18: dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba bzlog par rim pa
T02D1404:304b-19: ci lta ba bzhin du mchod cing rim pa las
T02D1404:304b-20: ma 'das pa ni go rims so //
T02D1404:304b-21: mchod pas gnyis su med pa ni gnyis med mchod pa'o //
T02D1404:304b-22: de'i don du sbyor ba ni gnyis med mchod pa'i
T02D1404:304b-23: sbyor ba de'i bdag nyid kyi las ni mchod pa
T02D1404:304b-25: las de rnams su sngags gang sbyar ba de ni rab tu 'grub pa ste /
T02D1404:304b-26: sde tshan brgyad po de dag gi //
T02D1404:304b-27: dbye ba las kyi bye brag brjod //
T02D1404:304b-29: bshad pa'i sngags kyi bye brag gi las kyi dbye ba 'di ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T02D1404:304b-30: rigs kyi pho nya la sogs sngags //
T02D1404:304b-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1404:304b-32: rigs ni yi ge'i tshogs te sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
T02D1404:304b-33: pho nya mo ni rtsa'i rang bzhin gyi rnal 'byor ma'o //
T02D1404:304b-34: de dag dang bo gang las so //
T02D1404:304b-35: dag pa de ni rigs kyi pho nya mo la sogs pa ste /
T02D1404:304b-36: dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02D1404:304b-37: pho nya mo la sogs pa de dag gi rigs ni sngags te /
T02D1404:304b-38: rigs dang pho nya mo la sogs pa'i sngags so //
T02D1404:304b-39: gang gi phyir rigs dang pho nya mo la sogs
T02D1404:304b-40: pa sngags gang yin pa de'i phyir sngags kyi dbye
T02D1404:304b-41: ba'ang brjod do // las kyi dbye ba las de ji lta bu zhe na /

T02D1404:304b-43: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1404:304b-44: mda' rnams kyi shugs ni mda' ltar 'gro ba'o //
T02D1404:304b-45: 'gro ba de yang g-yas dang g-yon gyi dbye ba
T02D1404:304b-46: rnam pa gnyis der yongs su 'khor ba gang la
T02D1404:305a-0: @305a * // yod pa de ni mnga'i shugs ltar yongs su 'khor ba ste sngags so //
T02D1404:305a-1: phan tshun sbyor bas gsang sngags rnams //
T02D1404:305a-3: phan tshun zhes bya ba ni a'a li k'a li gnyis kyis a'a li k'a li gnyis so //
T02D1404:305a-5: rang rang phyogs kyis phye ba yin //
T02D1404:305a-11: spyi bo rnams su khyad par du byas pa'o //
T02D1404:305a-12: sa bon phreng bas de nas zin //

T02D1404:305a-16: g-yas dang g-yon gyi logs gnyis kyi dbus su dbyangs
T02D1404:305a-17: kyi yi ge bcu gnyis steng du blta zhing gnas
T02D1404:305a-18: pa thur du blta ba'i ka la sogs pa'i phreng
T02D1404:305a-19: ba gnyis kyis snying por byas pa'o //
T02D1404:305a-20: a'a li k'a li de na de gnyis yin te /
T02D1404:305a-21: de dag las kyi tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1404:305a-23: g-yas dang g-yon gyi phyogs su ni //
T02D1404:305a-24: dpyangs kyi yi ge bcu gnyis gnas //
T02D1404:305a-25: ka la sogs pa kun du bskor //
T02D1404:305a-26: steng du bltas par yang dag bshad //
T02D1404:305a-27: thur du blta ba dag gis ni //
T02D1404:305a-28: logs gnyis dbu ma su sbyar bar bya //
T02D1404:305a-29: lha mo de ltar bshad pa ste //
T02D1404:305a-30: rtsa ni dbyangs kyi ngang tshul nyid //
T02D1404:305a-34: 'gog pa ni 'gro ba dang 'od ba dang rnam par rengs pa'o //
T02D1404:305a-35: de'i phyir bsgrub bya zag pa med pa'i bde ba chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi skur 'gyur ro //
T02D1404:305a-39: 'gro ba 'gog pas bgrod par bya ba'i phyogs med pa'i phyir /
T02D1404:305a-40: gom pa gcig kyang ring du mi 'gro / zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1404:305a-42: bsgrub bya 'grub par de gom pa gcig kyang mi 'gro bar ma zad mod kyi /
T02D1404:305a-43: 'on kyang 'gog pa nyid ji ltar zhe na /
T02D1404:305a-44: kha sbyar sbyar bar gyur pa de //
T02D1404:305a-45: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1404:305a-46: a'a li k'a li gnyis kyis kha sbyar du byas nas /
T02D1404:305a-47: shes rab dang thabs kyi sbyar ba gang yin pa de ni kha sbyar te /
T02D1404:305a-48: rdo rje lu gu rgyud bcing ba'o //
T02D1404:305a-50: phyag gis 'khyud cing bcing ba ni 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid du bshad do //
T02D1404:305b-0: @305b thabs dang shes rab mnyam gzhag pas //
T02D1404:305b-1: kha sbyar du ni brjod pa yin //
T02D1404:305b-2: lag pa gnyis kyis 'khyud pa ni //
T02D1404:305b-3: rdo rje lu gu rgyud ces bshad //
T02D1404:305b-4: ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1404:305b-5: rdo rje phye ba nyid dang ni //
T02D1404:305b-7: padma ni rdo rje phye ba byas pa'o //
T02D1404:305b-8: padma ni rnam pa gnyis te ye shes kyi rang bzhin dang /
T02D1404:305b-9: yan lag gi rang bzhin no //
T02D1404:305b-10: ye shes ni ye shes so //
T02D1404:305b-11: rdo rje ni gnyis su med pa ste /
T02D1404:305b-14: bung ba bzhin du bskor bar bya //
T02D1404:305b-16: padmar rdo rje byung ba bzhin du bskor bar bya'o //
T02D1404:305b-17: khyu mchog rdeg pa la sogs pa'i rim pas thams cad bskyod par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1404:305b-19: rdo rjes padma dbye bar bya //
T02D1404:305b-20: byung bas sbrang rtsi byed par 'dod //
T02D1404:305b-21: skor ba bskyod pa zhes bshad do //
T02D1404:305b-22: de yi bde ba thams cad rig / ces gsungs so //
T02D1404:305b-23: lcags kyu nyid kyis dgug pa dang //
T02D1404:305b-25: 'dod pa'i lcags kyus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgug par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //

T02D1404:305b-28: dkrug pa'i don du gtun shing ste //
T02D1404:305b-29: de'i rdzas kyi chus dngos po thams cad dkrug par byed pas /
T02D1404:305b-30: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms par byed pas na gtun shing ngo //
T02D1404:305b-31: rdo rje'i sangs rgyas te de'i bza' ba ni 'dus pa'o //
T02D1404:305b-32: sad la mnga' ni sbyar bar bya //
T02D1404:305b-35: yan lag kha tv'am ga dang sbyar //
T02D1404:305b-38: thod pa ni mchod yon gyi snod do //
T02D1404:305b-39: zhal du mchod yon nges par sbyar //
T02D1404:305b-41: thod pa mchod yon gyi snod zhal du bsdu bar bya zhes bya'o //

T02D1404:305b-49: sngags kyi dgod pa bshad par bya //
T02D1404:305b-50: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /

T02D1404:306a-1: rgya'i mchod pa chen po ste //
T02D1404:306a-2: de'i sngags kyi bkod pa ni /
T02D1404:306a-3: phyag rgya chen po'i mchod pa'i sngags kyi bkod pa'o //
T02D1404:306a-4: der 'jug pa'i rgyu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1404:306a-5: de dag myur du dngos grub byed //
T02D1404:306a-6: ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1404:306a-7: phyag rgya'i mchod pa 'dis myur du dngos grub 'grub par byed pa de'i phyir /

T02D1404:306a-10: sngags kyi sbyor ba mtshan gnyis su //
T02D1404:306a-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1404:306a-12: sngags ni yi ge gnyis te /
T02D1404:306a-16: mkha' 'gro dpa' bo gnyis med pa //
T02D1404:306a-17: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1404:306a-18: mkha' 'gro ma ni rdo rje phag mo ste phyag rgya'o //
T02D1404:306a-19: dpa' bo ni bcom ldan 'das dpal bde mchog ste thabs so //
T02D1404:306a-20: de gnyis su bsdus pa ni mkha' 'gro dpa' bo'o //
T02D1404:306a-21: gnyis su med pa ni bya ba'i khyad par ro //
T02D1404:306a-22: bshad pa'i thabs kyis ci zhig bya zhe na /
T02D1404:306a-23: rnal 'byor ma la mkhas pas bskyod //
T02D1404:306a-24: ces bya ba la sogs pa smos so //

T02D1404:306a-26: bshad pa'i rim pas lus dag par byas pa'o //
T02D1404:306a-27: rang 'od ces bya ba ni rang gi 'dod pa

T02D1404:306a-29: sring mo'i bu mo las gzhan ma yin no //
T02D1404:306a-30: dpa' bo'i mchod bya rnams byas nas //

T02D1404:306a-33: nas phyi dang nang gi mchod pa spyad par bya
T02D1404:306a-34: ba'o // rnam par dbye ba ni khyod kyis ma mchu la sogs pa zung shig pa dang /
T02D1404:306a-35: gtso bo'i bya ba yang rang gi bya ba yin no //
T02D1404:306a-36: phyin ci log pa rang nyid sbyar //
T02D1404:306a-37: zhes bya ba la skyes bu'i bya ba yin no //

T02D1404:306a-40: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

T02D1404:306a-43: de'i don ni tshar gcod pa dang phan 'dogs pa'i don du'o //
T02D1404:306a-44: de nyid dbye bas rnam par dbye //
T02D1404:306a-46: de nyid ni lnga po rnam par dag par byed pa ste /
T02D1404:306a-47: gti mug rdo rje ma la sogs pa rigs lnga'o //

T02D1404:306b-0: @306b bcas pa'i rtsa lnga'i 'khor lo de nyid khyad
T02D1404:306b-1: par du byas pa ni dbye ba'o //

T02D1404:306b-5: rtsa gsum gyi lam du sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1404:306b-6: sbyor ba'i phyir ni rab bsgrub bya //

T02D1404:306b-11: 'di ni bsgrub par bya zhes bya ba la /
T02D1404:306b-12: mchod pas bsgrubs pa'i phyag rgyas bcom ldan 'das bde
T02D1404:306b-13: ba chen pos lha dang lha min dang mi rnams

T02D1404:306b-28: phan tshun sbyar ba ni bsgrub par bya ba dang /
T02D1404:306b-29: sgrub pa po de gnyis 'brel ba ni phan tshun sbyar ba'o //
T02D1404:306b-30: bsgrub bya'i lus la gnas nas su sgrub par byed pa'i lus la zhugs par bya'o //

T02D1404:307a-5: bzlas pa'i mtha' der zos pa de skyug par bya'o //
T02D1404:307a-6: skyugs pa des ci zhig bya zhe na /

T02D1404:307a-31: ji ltar mkha' 'gro ma rnams dpa' bo'i yan lag
T02D1404:307a-32: gi khyad par du gyur pa de nyid bstan par

T02D1404:313b-34: gnas dad nye ba'i gnas la sogs pas nye bar
T02D1404:313b-35: mtshon pa'i sa la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma nyi
T02D1404:313b-36: shu rtsa bzhi'o // sa dang rnal 'byor ma de dag ci lta bu zhe na /
T02D1404:313b-37: yan lag nying lag he ru ka'i //
T02D1404:313b-38: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1404:313b-39: yan lag dang nying lag ni yan lag go //
T02D1404:313b-40: yan lag thams cad brtan g-yo'i bdag //
T02D1404:313b-42: he ru ka ma yin pa'i thams cad kyi yan lag thams cad do //
T02D1404:313b-43: brtan g-yo'i bdag nyid ni zhes bya ba la /
T02D1404:313b-44: brtan pa ni yul dang phyogs la sogs ba'o //
T02D1404:313b-45: g-yob ni skye po thams cad do //
T02D1404:313b-46: de'i bdag nyid gang la yod pa de ni sa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1404:313b-47: brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1404:313b-49: gnas ni rab tu grub pa'i sa //
T02D1404:314a-0: @314a * // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T02D1404:314a-1: sa de dag gang gi yin zhe na /
T02D1404:314a-2: shr'i he ru ka'i gzhung spyod do //
T02D1404:314a-3: 'di dag nang gi bdag nyid sa //
T02D1404:314a-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1404:314a-5: he ru ka'i sprul pa'i sku'i rang bzhin gyi gzhung
T02D1404:314a-6: spyod pa'i gzhung spyod pa ni 'khyam pa'i sa rnams
T02D1404:314a-7: so // yi ge pu sogs kyis bstan pa //
T02D1404:314a-8: rgyud dang der pu dz'a ao aa go r'a de m'a /
T02D1404:314a-9: k'a ao tri ko ka la k'a hi /
T02D1404:314a-10: pre gri soo su na si ma ku / phyi'i sa rnams bshad nas /
T02D1404:314a-11: nang gi bdag nyid kyis sku'i 'khor la brten nas bshad par bya ste /
T02D1404:314a-12: kun du phyag dang zhabs ldan zhing //
T02D1404:314a-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1404:314a-14: yi ge pu la sogs pas dz'a landha ra la sogs pa'i bar du rnam par rtogs par bya'o ;
T02D1404:314a-15: / dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba las /
T02D1404:314a-16: dbang gi sbyin sreg dang gnas la sogs pa bstan par bya ba'i le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o /
T02D1404:314a-18: // / dbang gi sbyin sreg dang gnas la sogs pa dang sa rnams brjod nas /
T02D1404:314a-19: man ngag bstan par bya ba'i phyir le'u lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1404:314a-20: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1404:314a-21: man ngag shin tu rnyed dka' ba //
T02D1404:314a-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1404:314a-23: shin tu ring du song nas man ngag gi rim pa bshad par bya zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D1404:314a-24: sbas pa zhes bya ba ni shin tu gsang ba'o //
T02D1404:314a-25: gal te sbas pa yin na ji ltar bshad par bya zhe na /
T02D1404:314a-26: dpa' bo yi ni brda ru gsungs //
T02D1404:314a-28: dpa' bo rnams kyi phan tshun rtogs par byed pa'i brda ni dpa' bo'i brda'o //
T02D1404:314a-29: des gsungs pa ni dpa' bo'i brdar gsungs pa'o //
T02D1404:314a-30: de dag grang du yin zhe na /
T02D1404:314a-31: de dag de nyid bcu bzhi ste //
T02D1404:314a-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1404:314a-33: de nyid bcu bzhi de dag gang zhe na /
T02D1404:314a-34: gos ni phyag rgya lnga dang ldan //
T02D1404:314a-35: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1404:314a-36: gos ni stag gi pags pa'o //
T02D1404:314a-37: yang na gang du gnas pa de ni gos te gzhal yas khang ngo //
T02D1404:314a-38: phyag rgya lnga la sogs pa ni me long lta bu la sogs pa'i ye shes lnga'o //
T02D1404:314a-39: shes rab yan lag ces bya ba ni rdo rje bzhi ste /
T02D1404:314a-40: dang po stong nyid byang chub sems //
T02D1404:314a-41: gnyis pa sa bon bsdus pa'o ;
T02D1404:314a-42: / gsum pa gzugs brnyan rdzogs pa ste //
T02D1404:314a-43: bzhi pa yi ge dgod pa'o //
T02D1404:314a-45: phur bu dra ba ni khro bo'i phur bu dang /
T02D1404:314a-46: rdo rje ra ba dang dra ba dang bla re
T02D1404:314a-47: dang mda'i dra ba dang me'i 'obs la sogs pa'o
T02D1404:314a-48: // a'a li k'a li zhes brjod pa //
T02D1404:314a-50: zla ba dang nyi ma'i gzugs su gyur pa'o //
T02D1404:314b-0: rgyu la sogs @314b stong sngon 'gro yin //
T02D1404:314b-2: rgyu ni skyed par byed pa ste /
T02D1404:314b-3: de dang po gang la yod pa de ni rgyu
T02D1404:314b-4: la sogs pa ste byas pa la sogs pa'i skye
T02D1404:314b-5: ba'o // des stong pa ni rgyu la sogs pas stong pa ste /
T02D1404:314b-6: bya ba nan tan grub pa'i ye shes bzhi pa'o //
T02D1404:314b-8: sangs rgyas kun gyi bya ba gang //
T02D1404:314b-9: snang ba med cing gzhi med pa //
T02D1404:314b-10: ma skyes ma byas dag pa ste //
T02D1404:314b-11: dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs //
T02D1404:314b-13: de las lam de'i sngon du 'gro ba ni gsum pas sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1404:314b-14: 'jug pa sgra la sogs pa nas //
T02D1404:314b-16: rgyu'i rdo rje 'chang gis 'jug pa ni skye ba'i rgyur gyur pa sgra ste /
T02D1404:314b-17: gnas skabs bzhi dang ldan pa'i yi ge h'um ngo //
T02D1404:314b-19: zla ba dang nyi ma'i mtshan ma dag go //
T02D1404:314b-20: ji srid bsdus pa'i sbyor ldan nyid //
T02D1404:314b-22: gsum po de dag gong bu'i tshul du bsdus pa'i sbyor ba ni nan tan grub pa'i sbyor ba'o //
T02D1404:314b-23: bdud rtsis tshim byed ces bya ba ni /
T02D1404:314b-24: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi
T02D1404:314b-25: bdag nyid can gyi rdo rje 'chang chen po de
T02D1404:314b-26: dgug par bya'o // mya ngan las 'das bya ba ni //
T02D1404:314b-27: zhes bya ba ni de las gzhan pa nyid kyis gzhan du bzlog pa'o //
T02D1404:314b-28: lag pa'i mchod pa zhes bya ba ni sngar bshad pa'i rtogs pas bya ba'o //
T02D1404:314b-29: bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi rnal 'byor ba gal te 'chi ba yin na /
T02D1404:314b-30: gzhan gang zhig lus snyam na /
T02D1404:314b-31: 'pho ba'i dus na rnal 'byor pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1404:314b-32: gzhan rnams ni 'chi zhing gshin rje'i 'jig rten du
T02D1404:314b-33: 'gro na rnal 'byor ba yang sngon gyi las yongs
T02D1404:314b-34: su gtong bas gnas khyad par can la brten par
T02D1404:314b-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1404:314b-38: spros pa thams cad las grol zhing sems can thams
T02D1404:314b-39: cad kyi don byed pas na gnas te sku gnyis
T02D1404:314b-40: sdud par byed pa rang bzhin kyis [*gyis] 'od gsal
T02D1404:314b-41: ba'i sems te / mkha' 'gro'i gnas so //
T02D1404:314b-43: sa steng na ni rnyed par dka' //
T02D1404:314b-45: de ltar yon tan bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das dpal bde mchog dang /
T02D1404:314b-46: dpa' bo ste thod pa'i dum bu phyed pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D1404:314b-47: rnal 'byor ma rab gtum ma la sogs pa de
T02D1404:314b-48: dag sa steng na rnyed par dka' ba ste lus
T02D1404:314b-49: kho nar rnyed par sla zhes bya ba'i don to
T02D1404:315a-0: // @315a * // phyag rgya bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1404:315a-1: mgul rgyan gdu bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T02D1404:315a-2: bsgom pa ni gnas bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1404:315a-3: ri rtsa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T02D1404:315a-4: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la brten nas dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i mtshan bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1404:315a-5: rdo rje dril bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1404:315a-6: de la 'khor lo dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir rdo rje dril bu dang /
T02D1404:315a-9: 'khyud ces bya ba ni de dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya gnyis kyis dpa' bo la 'khyud pa'o //
T02D1404:315a-10: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo rnams kyi sgras bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1404:315a-11: rtsa bzhi phyed ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1404:315a-12: dpa' bo dang dpa' mo rnams kyi phyed ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02D1404:315a-13: yang na zhal re re dang spyan gsum gsum ste /
T02D1404:315a-14: zhal bzhi la spyan bcu gnyis so //
T02D1404:315a-15: spyan gyi grangs kyis zhal gyi grangs shes par bya'o //
T02D1404:315a-16: de ltar gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das la dpa' bo
T02D1404:315a-17: dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis bskor zhes bya ba
T02D1404:315a-18: ni / mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa dang /
T02D1404:315a-19: khva gdong ma la sogs pa dang /
T02D1404:315a-20: gshin rje sreg ma la sogs pa'i 'khor dag gis yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02D1404:315a-21: ji ltar de dag sgom zhe na /
T02D1404:315a-22: srub dang bsrub ba bya'i sbyor ldan pas //
T02D1404:315a-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
T02D1404:315a-24: dpa' 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba /
T02D1404:315a-25: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las /
T02D1404:315a-26: le'u lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'o /
T02D1404:315a-28: // / mtshan mchog bla ma nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud phyi ma /
T02D1404:315a-29: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa phyag bzhi nas khri phrag
T02D1404:315a-30: bcu'i bar gyi phyag mtshan 'chang ba'i he ru ka
T02D1404:315a-31: las / snying rje'i dbang gis lha mos btus pa'i dka' 'grel rin po che'i tshogs zhes bya ba /
T02D1404:315a-32: slob dpon chen po dpal dka' rgyal mi thub zla bas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1404:315a-34: // / rmongs pa'i gnas kun rtogs byed blo zhes bya ba yis //
T02D1404:315a-35: man ngag ma lus nges par ston pa'i sgron ma 'di //
T02D1404:315a-36: don gsal rin chen tshogs zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel 'dis //
T02D1404:315a-37: don rnams rtogs par byed pa yid 'ong ston byed yin //
T02D1404:315a-38: rgya gar gyi mkhan po t'a ra kla shu dang ;
